details.issue: serve.py defaults to 5001, Luminar Nexus also configured for 5001
details.root_cause: Two backend services competing for port 5001
details.expected: Port 5001 = Vite UI (HTML), Port 5000 = Backend API (JSON)

recommendation.reason: Two backends is redundant. Node.js backend should handle everything.
recommendation.action: Remove serve.py from auto-start or change its port to 8000
recommendation.best_practice: One backend per app, not multiple

details.reason: Keep Luminar Nexus on 5000/5001, serve.py optional on 5002

details.error: HTTPConnectionPool(host='localhost', port=5001): Max retries exceeded with url: / (Caused by NewConnectionError('<urllib3.connection.HTTPConnection object at 0x7a24ff5f7a70>: Failed to establish a new connection: [Errno 111] Connection refused'))
